text: Tama Racmat geytam Yallih farmoytay Yallih Nabii kinniy akriye waah aktube waay usun sinni xaqul Tawraat kee Injiil addal kutbeh geyaanay maqaaneh ken amrisaah umaanek ken waasaah meqem keenih calalloysaah umam keenil carammoysa, Qibaadaa kee diini madqooqiy keenil Qilsuk gibiduk sugte keenil xabbacoyse kataata mara kinni, toysa Nabii Mucammad fca Nummayseeh kaa yeynebeeh kay diinil kaa Qokleeh kaal obsime Noori (Qhuraan kinnuk) kataate mara kinni, woo mari usun Yalli moominiin kah xagnise niqmootal yaffoofe mara
